name: PowerPoles_ASMS
title: Power Poles
author: Ondra4260
description: PowerPoles AndSoMuchStuff: This mod adds so much more stuff, Roboport(with construction and logsistic robots), power poles (3 tiers),3 more types of repair packs,silenced sub machine gun, all has its own science that is logical with no jump or missing paths(so you can't research bots if you dont have robotics etc.).
